page.title: 07GOLF
page.content: My Father is a member of the Crusaders Golfing Society.Most of its members come from the Northwood area.They like playing on different golf courses and amongst these are Haste Hill,Moor Park and Aldenham.They often play competitions for trophies of which my Father has won three. We are lucky living on Haste Hill because there is a golf course practically behind our house.Whenever my Father gets the chance he goes out and practices there,especially if there is a competition coming up. He usually goes golfing during the summer months as it is still light when he gets home from work. Unlike Moor Park and Aldenham,Haste Hill golf course is not actually floodlit.Even so it is often very crowded as many people use it.It is a very good golf course.
